Articles.Content:
Hi all. Im fully updated to 1.4.1 with MH and wanted to start a new career however I cant stand the science grind that goes with it. I used in 1.3.1 a mod called For Science which automatically does the science bits for you. I checked out the mod version and it still states it is for 1.3.1 but I thought, what the heck, lets try it on 1.4.1......

I can happily confirm that the mod is working perfectly on this latest version.....thought I'd let you all know in-case anyone is wanting this
Thats great to know. It is a livesaver for me, too.
